tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sports_memorabilia_assets (
    asset_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name VARCHAR(100),
    sport_type VARCHAR(50),
    year_created INT,
    token_id UUID UNIQUE,
    authenticity_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE sports_assets (
    asset_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    asset_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    asset_token_id UUID NOT NULL,
    trading_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE authentication (
    auth_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_id UUID NOT NULL,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    action_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE sports_memorabilia_assets (
    asset_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name VARCHAR(255),
    asset_type VARCHAR(50),
    token_id UUID,
    token_owner VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE trading_platform (
    platform_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    platform_name VARCHAR(100),
    platform_type VARCHAR(50),
    platform_location VARCHAR(255),
    platform_fee DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE asset_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_id INT,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    transaction_date DATE,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  asset_id INT NOT NULL,
  owner_id INT NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE NOT NULL,
  transaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE TokenTransactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    token_id INT REFERENCES AssetTokens(token_id),
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    transaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    transaction_details VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE TokenHistory (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    token_id INT REFERENCES AssetTokens(token_id),
    history_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    action VARCHAR(50),
    description VARCHAR(255)
);
